page.title: 10Views on Great Shelford
page.content:
One man we interviewed was over 65. He used a car for transport. Several young people as well as some older people were interviewed, some used a car while others used a bike.
They all did some kind of sport and were very enthusiastic. Most of them travelled into Cambridge for their shopping as there was lots of choice.
The land is flat except for the occasional hill. It is good agricultural land around Great Shelford and the types of farming are very interesting. Many fields are brilliant yellow (Rape), and later on golden ripe corn covers them.
There is plenty of open space for recreation and other such activities.
